dcterms:description: The DTU dataset consists of complex object-level scenes with wide-baseline views spanning a half hemisphere, used for evaluating multi-view stereopsis.
dcterms:title: DTU

dcterms:description: The LLFF dataset consists of forward-facing scenes, where every 8th image is used as the test set, allowing for evaluation of novel view synthesis.
dcterms:title: LLFF

dcterms:description: The Replica dataset is a digital replica of indoor spaces, designed for evaluating 3D reconstruction and scene understanding tasks.
